entries.message:
Event Type: Service Degraded Performance and Availability

Our Cloud Storage team is investigating a partial outage scenario with our Image and HDD Block Storage infrastructure. The following services may be impacted by this event:

- VPS and Bare Metal deploys
- Snapshots
- Auto-backups
- Custom ISOs
- HDD Block Storage

We are working quickly to restore service to its optimal state.

Event Type: Network Upgrade

We are performing system changes in the Seoul location during the following scheduled maintenance window. 

Start Time: 2023-02-27 19:00:00 UTC
End Time: 2023-02-27 23:00:00 UTC

We schedule higher impact maintenance events during off-peak times to maintain our ideal hosting environment. Our engineers make every effort to minimize system impact; however, Seoul instances may be unreachable for some, or all, of the scheduled maintenance window as we perform network, firmware, or host upgrades.

Event Type: Network Upgrade

We are performing system changes in the Sydney location during the following scheduled maintenance window. 

Start Time: 2023-02-21 13:00:00 UTC
End Time: 2023-02-21 17:00:00 UTC

We schedule higher impact maintenance events during off-peak times to reduce impact to customer infrastructure. Our engineers make every effort to minimize system impact, however, network reachability to Sydney instances may be affected for some, or all, of the scheduled maintenance window as we perform this work. While itâ€™s important to be aware of start and end times of the maintenance window, due to our redundant network architecture, our engineers expect that you may see little to no impact at all while the work is performed.
